channel.title: Scamming
channel.description:
Have you? Why? How long ago?
Phishing constitutes as scamming as well.

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

God it just makes me mad that people do this shit i got lured for 50m yesterday and i was not happy at all scammers/lurers only think about theirself and not the person that gets scammed.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Newty:

I don’t believe that cheating and scamming are even close to the same thing. But this is a cheating site and as such we should expect that there will also be scammers here.

I disagree. That is what makes this different than other runescape cheating sites (like sythe.org), most others tolerate scammers, moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com does not.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I scammed someone when houses came out, when people fell for “put items on table then re-obtain them”. This was in 06, he did report me, he only lost 200k

Right now, i don’t feel bad at all, the amount of times iv been scammed since then is unbelievable and trust me, alot more than 200k.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Sadly… no I have not. Really I can’t think of one time of me being scammed. I believe in 2002 I remember some guy with rune saying if I gave him my password rune will appear in my inventory and I never did it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

I got scammed like yesterday lol. I made a new account and I had like 5k. I went to one of those kids who was saying doubling money and he did it and I got 18k. I think he was just giving me money. Then I just started trading random people because I didn’t care. I went from 18k to 5k hahah.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I scammed once back in 2006, though I gave it back as I felt bad about it. It was only 100K anyway, it was a lot to me back then. I did it because I was new to it all, desperate and immature. I have no intention of going back into scamming, ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:25, topic:383799”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=479559.msg3511261#msg3511261 date=1298590632]

Pure2Veteran said mitb banned him because he said he scammed player’s on RS lol.

That’s right. He was on IRC bragging about his scamming. It’s common knowledge I hate scammers and will always ban them. So I’d advise the rest of you not to scam, ever.

Also, I’m not saying people can’t change, but if you still scam people you aren’t welcome on this site.

Isn’t this an Rs cheating site?

Why wouldn’t we support scamming, I mean it’s a runescape cheating community after all

[/quote]

I can’t believe you two don’t know the difference between scamming and cheating.[/quote]

Cheating is a way to gain an unfair advantage from others. Which scamming goes under it.

Read full topic

Also, I’m not saying people can’t change, but if you still scam people you aren’t welcome on this site.

[/quote][/quote]

item.title: Scamming
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Scamming and cheating are two completely different things.

Cheating=Making life easier for us by not having to do repetitive tasks
Scamming=Stealing, not really cool.
